data.text: Lekeni tar mana ka kweth mag rombe makoro eka oliel yiegi
Pien dhogi chalo gi law marakwaro;
Thundeni chalo gi nyithi mwanda ariyo maromre
Yaye jaherana, bi wadhi kodi ka waa e got Lebanon,
Mano kaka herani miya mor, yaye osiepna, ma ahero;
Yaye jaherana, pien dhogi mit ka mor kich;
Yaye jaherana, ichalo gi puodho mochiel;
Yiende madongo e puothi gin olembe mongʼinore,
Gin olembe mopogore opogore kaka nad kod safron,
Ichalo gi puodho ma thidhna ni e iye,
Wuogi ka ikudho, in yamb nyandwat,
